timeline.message:
Split buried/suspended in statistics view

Divide the current "Suspended+Buried" stat in the "Card Types" section
of "Statistics" into separate "Suspended" and "Buried" stats. The latest
versions of desktop Anki do this.

timeline.bodyText:
I think your mention of this in the PR was your intuition feeling it is probably better to to go ahead and change this, and I think it is one of the cases where the old key needs to go away and a fresh key needs to go in, as this is semantically different now. It's great to be sensitive to the translator workload but semantic differences should be respected

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                <string name="statistics_suspended_and_buried">Suspended</string>
          
          
            
                <string name="statistics_suspended">Suspended</string>
          
      
    
    
  

Please note, I have not looked to see if the old key was used elsewhere! It very well might be, then I'd argue for addition of this key I'm suggesting without deleting the old key
timeline.author: mikehardy

replies.bodyText:
Okay, I've renamed both this key and the color-key and tested that change. Looks like things still work.
The only change that felt sketchy was in lint-baseline.xml. Based on the commit history, I think that usage is safe to delete (hiding linter complaints for a problem that can't happen once that key's gone). I deleted it, but let me know if I should restore (or restore and replace the old key with the new one).
With that deletion, I think the old key is only present in the translation files. git grep 'suspended_and_buried' -- ':!AnkiDroid/src/main/res/**/*' doesn't find anything.
replies.author: jdpopkin

timeline.bodyText:
same thought process here as above with the translation though this doesn't ripple out to translations at least - if stats_suspended_and_buried is not used elsewhere in the combination, then I'd vote for altering the key in all cases (colors themes etc) to be like so

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                <attr name="stats_suspended_and_buried" format="color"/>
          
          
            
                <attr name="stats_suspended" format="color"/>

timeline.message:
Rename suspended_and_buried keys

Per code review, now that we're dividing the "Suspended+Buried" content
into two separate statistics, we should rename the
`statistic_suspended_and_buried` translation-key and
`stats_suspended_and_buried` color-key - they only include suspended
cards now.
